name: Hotel Oceania Quimper

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed in three Oceania hotels in Brittany. This was one of them. The hotel is convenient to stay for a night. You can have a walk and dinner in Quimper and then head back for the hotel for the night (what we did). The breakfast here was only OK, with several choices not available (probably a big group got rid of everything very early in the morning). Anyhow, if you get a good price, the Oceania in Quimper is a nice, modern and clean option. The close Carrefour is a plus to stock groceries and petrol before leaving in the morning to continue the trip.
reviews.title: Good option for a stopover. Don't expect too much

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Although we've been to France numbers of times, this is the first trip during which we stayed at Ocxeania Hotel chain properties. What a delighful surprise after being disappointed with so-called 3 star hotels of the Mercure chain. The Quimper Oceania, like the Oceania Airport hotel in Nantes, was stylish, service very professional, bedroom and bath spotless, and rooms well lighted. Next time we visit France we will check on this chain's properties first. Although I threw away their directory, I recall that they had properties in many cities in France. Would recommend others to consider this chain in general and the Quimper property in particular.
reviews.title: Oceania hotel chain reliability

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed overnight on the way from the ferry to our Gite.
reviews.title: Decent Overnight stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Good clean rooms, decent food and friendly staff. A bit on the outskirts of the city next to a large Carrefour - ideal for grocery shopping.
reviews.title: Convenient for An Overnight Stay

reviews.text: We stayed for one night after a ferry crossing to Roscoff. Good directions from Brittany Ferries meant that we found the hotel easily and the reception staff were friendly and efficient.
reviews.title: Not suitable for holidaymakers

description: The hotel which has been completely renovated will charm you with its spacious rooms that have modern conveniences (parquet floor, wide shower area, wifi), its restaurant, its comfortable bar and sundeck with swimming pool. The hotel is non-smoking.
